name: GreyBox Creative
description:
Grey Box Creative is a New York based creative agency that believes building a solid brand can become a company’s greatest asset. The GreyBox design team has been working together for two decades and has branded hundreds of companies helping to create or revitalize a brand. GreyBox has built it's reputation on delivering high quality, corporate identities in a range of industries and in a variety of formats.
Located in NYC, GreyBox Creative is a boutique strategic visual communications agency that delivers world-class design solutions for companies ready to elevate their brand.
